name: Speak Who is Calling - read notifications aloud
description: Speaks who is calling when your phone rings, reads aloud incoming text messages and notifications from any application you select, email client, your favourite communicator, chat, news or reminder app.  Listen to notifications, find out who is calling or texting without looking at the phone screen. Compose your own talking ringtones by adding text to be read before and after the caller name or message sender name.  You can easily configure the application to speak only when headphones are connected or at selected times of day, set the voice speed and the speech tone. It works without internet connection.  The application is compatible with Google tts engine, so you have an easy access to high quality, natural male and female voices in over 40 languages: Bangla (Bangladesh), Bangla (India), Cantonese (Hong Kong), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English (Australia), English (India), English (United Kingdom), English (United States), Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French (Canadian), French (France), German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Khmer, Korean, Mandarin (China), Mandarin (Taiwan), Nepali, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Sinhala, Slovak, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (United States), Sundanese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian and Vietnamese.
